hanzi-su-wiki:
顕

Значения

Раскрывать, выявлять; показывать; обнаруживать

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Слева — «заметный». Просветление, когда в голове 頁 всё стало понятным.

Варианты

顯, 显
purpleculture_pinyin:
xiǎn
Japanese variant of 显
Японский вариант значительного
rtega_mnemonic:
顯顯RS
显显		顕manifest, display, evident, clear
  • fibres displayed in the sun 㬎 clearly visible to the head 頁
  • ⓢ something standing side by side 业 displayed in the sun 日 (visible to the head 頁)
heisig_constituent: appear, sun, day, row, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: Somebody's head appears from behind the laundry in a row drying under the sun
koohiiStory2: Clouds were covering the sky for months now. Rows upon rows of people spent whole days with their heads turned upwards, waiting for sun to appear.
jp_example_words: 顕微鏡(けんびきょう): microscope
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When the sun comes up the spikes of geoducks appear.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The spikes don't just come out of the geoduck, they literally appear out of thin air. They didn't even exist before the sun touched them.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You watch these spikes appear and suddenly Ken (けん)the samurai also appears next to you. "I DID IT!" he shouts, "I've learned how to appear out of thin air!"
WaniKani_Reading_Info: "Thank you sweet geoduck, you have taught me the way of appearing with your spikes."

  • выражать, проявлять, выказывать, выявлять, обнаруживать

    • warodai
    顕彰するけんしょうする
  • выявлять, проявлять, привлекать общественное внимание (обычно к хорошему)
    • warodai

    • warodai
    顕現けんげん

    • warodai

  • явно, с очевидностью, заметно, примечательно

    顕在なけんざいな

    • warodai
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 日 (день), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина), 頁 (страница)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if the sun is almost lined up (显) the page (頁) will appear

Name meaning
The Japanese for "显" uses simplified Chinese characters.
xiǎn
яп. вм. 显
Radicals: 日, 頁  (sun, geoduck, spikes)
Meaning Mnemonic
When the sun comes up the spikes of geoducks appear.
The spikes don't just come out of the geoduck, they literally appear out of thin air. They didn't even exist before the sun touched them.
Reading Mnemonic
You watch these spikes appear and suddenly Ken (けん)the samurai also appears next to you. "I DID IT!" he shouts, "I've learned how to appear out of thin air!"
"Thank you sweet geoduck, you have taught me the way of appearing with your spikes."
